full_summary:
# System Re-fit Project Tender Notice

## Project Title and Number

* English: Office Area Re-fit tender [WS4084033880-Doc4162025284]
* French: Réaménagement d’un espace à bureaux appel d’offres [WS4084033880-doc4162025284]

## Important Tender Details

This is a Request for Proposals (RFP) for non-residential building construction services, specifically for a system re-fit project within the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Tender Information

* Tender Number: WS4084033880-Doc4162025284
* Closing Date and Time: September 6th, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
* Publication Date: August 25th, 2023

## Project Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide non-residential building construction services for a system re-fit project within the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Bid Submission Requirements

* Bidders must submit their required supporting documentation and bid by the closing date and time mentioned above.
* Late bid submissions will be considered non-responsive.

## Selection Criteria

The lowest price bid will be the selection criterion.

## Contact Information

For more information, please visit the Ariba Discovery posting [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17268870?extsite=MTcyNjg4NzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==].
Michael McShane from the PSPC Department can be reached at [michael.mcshane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca] with any questions or for a debriefing.

## Disclaimer

This tender solicitation cancels and supersedes bid solicitation number EP076-240128, dated July 18th, 2023, with a closing of August 17th, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT. A debriefing will be provided upon request for bidders who bid on the previous solicitation.
 
Note: I reformatted some information to make it easier to read: changed the formatting to headings (numbers), rephrased some descriptions for readability, included translations of the project title and the request title. *Note I excluded the explicit mention of contracting office, programming language (as it was an incomplete generic Courriel and written by hand) and other personal identifying information for privacy.
